amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used by the Department of Justice to bring any action against any State for implemention of a State law requiring voter identification.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Justice to bring any action against any State for implementation of a State law requiring voter identification.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 190 (Roll no. 231).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 190 (Roll no. 231).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
